domain.title: Environment
domain.text:
Our associates provide consulting concerning issues of protection and preservation of environment, prevention and control of pollution, respectively compliance of business and documents with the valid regulations in the field of environment, as well as the regulations governing energy, planning and construction, production and management of chemicals, waste, etc.
    We assist our clients to define strategies and draft contracts regarding waste management with a selected strategic partner, help them operate businesses in accordance with regulations pertaining to the food safety and organic production as well as fulfillment of the requirements for obtaining appropriate certificates.
